name: Gift Wrapping
description:
(Almost!) Free gift wrapping for holiday and birthday gifts! Add this to your cart along with your items, we'll email you for more information. You provide us with the addresses you'd like the gifts sent to, and we take care of the rest. 

You can't go wrong with the gift of the Word! :)

*Shirt/item will be in an appropriate wrapping paper, with a customized gift tag, mailed to the recipient via Priority Mail USPS. Please place your Christmas orders by Nov. 30th to make sure it's received by Christmas!*

I had to set the price at one cent because the system won't allow a 'free' transaction :)

name: "Haters Gonna Hate" Tee | Pre-Order
description:
"If the world hates you, remember that it hated me first." - John 15:18

A simple reminder for you when you feel persecuted! If God's own Son endured trials, surely we can be okay with being misunderstood and picked on for his name's sake!

If our haters (our critics, or enemies) dislike us because we follow Christ, then so be it! Let them hate.

It should not surprise us when those who despise Christ, despise us. We are a product of his inheritance and light of Christ that remains on earth. The Spirit he left with us resides with us and sets us apart! 


*Please allow 2 weeks for delivery for this pre-order shirt!
*Now available in YOUTH SIZES!! If you'd like a group discount for your youth group, please email shopnewwine@live.com.

You can read more about "Haters Gonna Hate" on our blog...this time, the blog inspired the shirt, usually its the other way around!!
http://newwineapparel.wordpress.com/2013/01/07/devotional-haters-gonna-hate/

name: ROPE Tee | PRE ORDER
description: This is a VERY special shirt! I got this quote from a newsletter called "Voice of the Martyrs", whose ministry serves persecuted Christians all over the world. I was inspired by this man, who was so firm in his faith and would not give up Christ for anything, even his life. *Black men's fit shirt *White rope graphic on the neckline with a red kiss **All profits from this shirt will go directly to VOM, so they can continue feeding, clothing, providing legal aid, and church supplies to persecuted Christians everywhere. (Check them out at www.persecution.com) Sizing guide HERE. If you'd like to learn more about this shirt, please visit our blog! http://newwineapparel.wordpress.com/2012/07/19/spotlight-rope-unisex-tee/

name: FORGIVEN Women's Tee
description: Imagine all your sin, everything you've ever done being written all over you. Now imagine Jesus swipes them all away, and covers them in his blood. That's what this shirt is about. Based on the story of the woman caught in adultery, found in John chapter 8. *Black shirt, white/red ink *Made in the USA *Swipe/Blood spatter & drip graphics; Words have a handwritten look, as if several people have written these things on you(r shirt). SIZING GUIDE You can read more about this shirt on our blog: http://newwineapparel.wordpress.com/2013/03/08/spotlight-forgiven-womens-tee/

name: DESTINY Girly Tee
description: This was New Wine's 2nd shirt ever! :) Ladies, never forget God has a purpose and plan for your life! This shirt is based on the life of Esther, how God guided her to save the entire Jewish people from a horrible fate. *Magenta queen/crest/banner design *white & magenta text, Black shirt See sizing line up HERE. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :) *The profits from this shirt will go to Destiny Rescue, a Christian organization that rescues children & young adults from sex slavery and trafficking. Learn more at www.destinyrescue.org *

name: King Tee
description: Shirt in memoriam of the death, burial, and resurrection of Christ! Quotes Luke 23:38, when the Lord was cruicified, his only crime was being 'the King'. *Has Latin, Hebrew, and Greek text on the back. *Black tee with white graphics and text. *Beautiful crucifixion graphic on front Sizing guide here. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: LIFE Maternity tee
description: Show off your growing belly with a powerful message! Features Jeremiah 1:5 "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you..." in an umbilicle cord configuration, with the words "This is life." above it. Choose pink or blue, if you happen to know the sex of your baby, or if you're a hipster mom, this tee is now available in black! :) *100% cotton MATERNITY fit tee-shirt *Sizes S-XL SIZE CHART WHEN YOU PURCHASE 'LIFE' Maternity Tee, we donate the profits to ICU MOBILE (http://icumobile.org/site/). This ministry saves the lives of babies AND moms by offering pregnant women prayer, free ultrasounds, support, and love. Many women have chosen life for their children AND gotten saved on these amazing mobile lifesavers! Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: Jesus U Tee
description: This Jesus University tee has the university logo on the front and a list of enrollee benefits on the back. It's a sharp shirt with witty stuff about the Bible and the perks of being a Christian. *Dark grey *White University logo on front *White Enrollee benefits on back Sizing guide HERE. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: "IVORY" Tee
description: "And I will destroy the beautiful homes of the wealthy--their winter mansions and their summer houses, too--all their palaces filled with ivory," says the LORD." Amos 3:15 (NLT) *charcoal grey shirt with white ink *extended sizes available With an elegant & strong design, this tee reminds everyone to 'tear down' all the material junk that isn't important and focus on what matters: God. Great conversation starter! Sizing guide here. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: Athletic Dept. Tee
description: Okay guys, (and athletic gals) here's one for you! *AVAILABLE IN EXTENDED SIZES! *Sports grey shirt *black graphics & text Perfect for gym, practice, or home, this sport grey tee has a simple image of a person lifting a cross, and the scripture Matthew 16:24 "Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me." This is a great way to share your faith and commitment to Christ while you're working out or just hanging out! Sizing guide HERE. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: John 3:16 Tee | in English, Español or Arabic
description: I once heard John 3:16 described as the summation of Christianity. Usually I try to use lesser known scriptures, but it occured to me, for as many people as there are who have heard John 3:16, there are tons of people who still have not. This brand new design is a white cotton tee with black & red text. Certain letters have been printed in red to create a cross down the center. I chose to do a cross on this one (usually another 'stereotypical' thing I try to avoid) because I realized it is the most recognizable symbol of Christianity there is. And because the point of these shirts are to draw attention to Jesus and his Word, a cross seemed like the quickest way to do it. Sizes S-4XL, 100% pre-shrunk cotton *Although I try my best to make sure the translations are accurate (and use credible engines like Google and Bing!) they might not always be 100% accurate. If you find that the translation on your shirt is wrong, (like if someone who speaks the language thinks you're calling their mother a fish...or something like that...) I will make it right and re-design the shirt to ensure its accuracy.* Sizing guide here. This tee is available in English, Spanish, and Arabic! Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: John 3:16 Tee | in French, Hebrew & Russian!
description: I once heard John 3:16 described as the summation of Christianity. Usually I try to use lesser known scriptures, but it occured to me, for as many people as there are who have heard John 3:16, there are tons of people who still have not. This brand new design is a white cotton tee with black & red text. Certain letters have been printed in red to create a cross down the center. Sizes S-4XL, 100% pre-shrunk cotton *Although I try my best to make sure the translations are accurate (and use credible engines like Google and Bing!) they might not always be 100% accurate. If you find that the translation on your shirt is wrong, (like if someone who speaks the language thinks you're calling their mother a fish...or something like that...) I will make it right and re-design the shirt to ensure its accuracy.* Sizing guide here Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: VESSEL Unisex tee | Two options!
description: Which tee will you wear today? The white Gildan cotton tee features Romans 9:21 “Hath not the potter power over the clay, of the same lump to make one vessel unto honor, and another unto dishonor?” And the dark heather Gildan tee features scripture 2 Timothy 2:21, “If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honor…” We are the clay, God is the potter, and we become vessels of honor, specially used to do his work- when we purge all of the yuck out of our lives. Shirt one tells you that God is the artist, and shirt two tells you how to get molded! Sizing guide HERE. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: GLORY Sweatshirt | 3 color choices!
description:
Options: 
Black sweatshirt with Red & White text
White sweatshirt with Turquoise & Black text (main picture)
Pink sweatshirt with Black & White text

Taken from Phillipians 4:20
Available in extended sizes!!

Always give God the glory in everything, he is truly worthy!

Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: TEAM JESUS | Football Jersey!
description: So excited about this one, folks! Football season is HERE! & this is the perfect replica jersey to rep Team Jesus! Available in men's sizes (but also appropriate for women), this mesh jersey is NOT intended to be used with pads, but is perfect for watching at home or in the stands! *White jersey, black ink Features Luke 16:13 - you can only serve one master! You'll probably need to wear a tank top under this jersey as the mesh will show skin underneath. I hope you're on TEAM JESUS! Please refer to this sizing chart If you'd like to read more about this jersey, please check out our blog: http://newwineapparel.wordpress.com/2012/12/17/spotlight-team-j-fb-jersey/ Note: this is a pre order item and could take 2+ weeks for delivery.

name: Jesus Christ University Ladies Tee
description: This collegiate themed women's shirt is perfect for class! For those of us in college, graduated, or who never got to attend, this shirt reminds us Jesus can teach us anything and everything we need to know! *Features two scriptures, Romans 12:2, and 1 Timothy 1:15! *Girly white v-neck *black lettering SIZING INFO Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: Romans 1:16 Tee
description: One of the first New Wine designs, this tee is a statement of bold faith, it lets everyone know just where you stand, and it's sure to be a conversation starter. *Black and white ink *100% Cotton tee in sapphire The Gospel truly is the power unto salvation for everyone who believes, so share it with this super cool shirt! Sizing guide HERE. If you'd like to know more about this shirt, please check out our blog! http://newwineapparel.wordpress.com/2012/08/06/spotlight-romans-116/

name: "Greater is He" Tee | Pre-Order
description: I've been waiting to do a typography style tee! A dark navy heather tee is the backdrop for crisp white lettering and grey accents, all highlighting 1 John 4:4! Not only is this shirt a great reminder, it is a powerful proclamation. It's our job as Christians to release God's Word into the world so it can cause fruitful change- this is a chic and comfy way to go about it. *Womens tee is pure navy, men's tee is heather navy See sizing guide HERE. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: Fishing Tee
description: Based on Matthew 4:19, this 100% cotton indigo blue shirt depicts two men casting their nets for average fish, and one man who's doing some serious soul catching! Perfect for your grandpa, husband, uncle, boyfriend, brother or dad! *Available in extended sizes *Indigo blue shirt *White graphics & text Sizing guide HERE. Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: PRINCES Tee & Duffle Bag
description: -----TSHIRT----- *Poly/cotton blend *Choose from Turqouise, Green, Purple or Red! *XXL available!! Sizing guide! -----BAG----- *Black nylon duffle bag *White ink Just like the PRINCES t-shirt! Girls, you can use this duffle for cheerleading practice, the gym, trips or sleepovers, or camping! The bag measures 10 (W) x 18 (L) Be sure to use this bag as a witnessing tool! When people ask you what it means, you can explain that it's better to take refuge in God than to put your trust in earthly princes. Put your faith in God, not in people! He NEVER changes and NEVER lets you down! Pre order, for now! :)

name: Reputation tee
description: This was New Wine's first shirt ever :) Ladies, this is for you! Based on the story of Ruth and Boaz, he knew she was a noble and virtuous woman because the entire town respected her for her determination and grace. What do people see when they think of you? I hope they think "all my fellow townsmen know you are a woman of noble character.." *Hot Pink tee *Black & white text SIZING GUIDE Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: LEGIT V-Neck | 3 colors!
description: Testifying about yourself, now that's legit! Features John 8:14-18! *Black shirt with magenta and white text or *Hot pink shirt with black & white text Also in Rainbow! Sizing Guide Pre-Order, please allow 2 weeks for order fulfillment. :)

name: 1 Corinthians Slouchy Fleece
description: Finally, a comfy sweatshirt with a scripture design front and center! *Wideneck *Red Heather fleece *White collegiate text *50% polyester, 37.5% cotton, 12.5% rayon SIZE CHART Pre-order, for now. :)

name: 1 Tim 4:12 Leather Bracelet
description:
This awesome leather bracelet is hand stamped with 1Timothy 4:12 
"Don't let anyone look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers in speech, in life, in love, in faith and in purity."

*Gun-metal snaps
*Dark cherry stain

What most people don't know is, Timothy was in his 40's when Paul wrote this letter. At any age you can be looked down upon by others for so called lack of experience. It's our job to prove them wrong in our dedication to the Lord, and the determination to fulfill his calling upon our lives!

Made in the USA! :)

You can read more about this bracelet on our blog! http://newwineapparel.wordpress.com/2013/04/08/spotlight-1-timothy-412-bracelet/

Please allow 1 week for order fulfillment on this item in addition to shipping time. I apologize for the inconvenience!
